title: Season 4.21 Rift Scuttler glitch
body:
I recently played a beginner bot game as {{champion:134}} to practice, and i messed around with throwing creeps.
I threw the Rift Scuttler on baron side into the wall of blue team's wolves.
As the Scuttler landed it got trapped, and was unable to move. The scuttler remained in wolf camp until it was killed.

Just thought i would throw that out there.
 :D

Citrusturtle

replies.body:
>Just thought i would throw that out there.

the puns are real
